DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy rosuvastatin Korean dyslipidemia patient diabetes
DOC.brief_title: Crestor RAPID ( The Efficacy RosuvAstatin Korean Dyslipidemia PatIents With Diabetes )
DOC.criteria: Hyperlipidemia patient prescribe rosuvastatin 10mg , base clinical ground fulfil follow criterion 1 . Over 18 year age 2 . Diagnosed DM base fast postload glucose data and/or clinical assessment clinician 1 . Patients already take hyperlipidemic agent 2 . Patients fulfil indication criterion statin therapy 3 . Patients baseline and/or followup lipid data verify efficacy data
